text: mariyu allah pai abad'dhapu ninda mope vani kante, leda tanapai e divya jnanam (vahi) avatarincaka poyinappatiki: "Napai divyajnanam avatarimpa jeyabadutundi." Ani ceppevani kante, leda: "Allah avatarimpa jesinatuvanti visayalanu nenu kuda avatarimpajeyagalanu." Ani palike vani kante, mincina durmargudu evadu? Durmargulu marana vedanalo unnappudu devadutalu tama cetulu caci: "Mi pranalanu vadalandi! Allah pai asatyalu palukutu unnandu valana mariyu ayana sucanala patla anadarana cupatam valana, i roju miku avamanakaramaina siksa vidhincabadutundi!" Ani antu unde drsyanni nivu cudagaligite enta bagundedi
